tool_description: Api that filters through notable news networks for China, Japan, and Korea news
name: East China News
title: East China News

api_list.name: Filter Japan news by newspaper company
Filter Korea news by newspaper company
Filter China news by newspaper company
Filter for conflict
api_list.description: Filters for conflict in all three regions
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://east-china-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/conflict"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "east-china-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://east-china-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/conflict"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "east-china-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: newspaper company filter for news
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://east-china-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "east-china-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://east-china-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "east-china-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
